sourcesContent:
import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react' import { Button, Row, Col, ListGroup, Image, Card } from 'react-bootstrap' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import { useDispatch, useSelector } from 'react-redux' import { PayPalButton } from 'react-paypal-button-v2' import Message from '../components/Message' import Loader from '../components/Loader' import { getOrderDetails, payOrder, deliverOrder } from '../actions/orderActions' import { ORDER_PAY_RESET, ORDER_DELIVER_RESET } from '../constants/orderConstants' import { useParams } from 'react-router-dom' function OrderScreen() { const { id } = useParams(); const dispatch = useDispatch() const orderDetails = useSelector(state => state.orderDetails) const { order, error, loading } = orderDetails if (!loading && !error) { order.itemsPrice = order.orderItems.reduce((acc, item) => acc + item.price * item.qty, 0).toFixed(2) } useEffect(() => { if (!order || order._id !== Number(id) ) { dispatch(getOrderDetails(id)) } else if (!order.isPaid) { if (!window.paypal) { addPayPalScript() } else { setSdkReady(true) } } }, [dispatch, order, id]) return loading ? ( ) : error ? ( {error} ) : (

Order: {order.Id}

Shipping

Name: {order.user.name}

Email: {order.user.email}

Shipping: {order.shippingAddress.address}, {order.shippingAddress.city} {' '} {order.shippingAddress.postalCode}, {' '} {order.shippingAddress.country}

{order.isDelivered ? ( Delivered on {order.deliveredAt} ) : ( Not Delivered )}

Payment Method

Method: {order.paymentMethod}

{order.isPaid ? ( Paid on {order.paidAt} ) : ( Not Paid )}

Order Items

{order.orderItems.length === 0 ? Order is empty : ( {order.orderItems.map((item, index) => ( {item.name} {item.qty} X ${item.price} = ${(item.qty * item.price).toFixed(2)} ))} )}

Order Summary

 Items: ${order.itemsPrice} Shipping: ${order.shippingPrice} Tax: ${order.taxPrice} Total: ${order.totalPrice} {/* {!order.isPaid && ( {loadingPay && } {!sdkReady ? ( ) : ( )} )} */} {/* {loadingDeliver && } {userInfo && userInfo.isAdmin && order.isPaid && !order.isDelivered && ( )} */}
) } export default OrderScreen
